ygData.subject: Re: Alliance  (re: kryten)
ygData.msgSnippet: You cast alliance on yourself?  not on the target/vendor?  I have to try this. ... _________________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Get
ygData.messageBody:
You cast alliance on yourself? not on the target/vendor? I have to
try this.

--- Jeff Wilkinson <wilkie@...> wrote:
> From: "Jeff Wilkinson" <wilkie@...>
>
>
> > Message: 8
> > Date: Tue, 25 May 1999 15:01:58 +0900
> > From: XIII <dlepriol@...>
> > Subject: Silly me (various topics)
> >
> > Ok, just did a quick log to check out the last
> patch.
> >
> > - Alliance. Try illus human + alliance on a vendor
> (Freeport) (I play
> > Erudite) Price did not go down. . Tried the same
> on the Erudite gemseller
> > in EC, same result. So this is obviously not this
> spell's use.
> > Still at it,
> > I have other ideas to test.
>
> Alliance does work try casting alliance on your self
> then look at the
> prices. You will only notice a price difference on
> stuff that is 1 gold or
> more from what I noticed. I did this lastnight
> after the server came back
> up in freeport and I am a Erudite also.
>
> Kryten of Eci
>
>
